Text: "White Wedding" is a song by Billy Idol that appeared on his album "Billy Idol" in 1982.

Text: White Wedding (song):  In the UK it reached No. 6 in the UK Singles Chart upon its re-release there in 1985 and 1988, when it was re-issued to promote the "Vital Idol" remix album.
